import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { ArrowRight, BookOpen, Users, Target, TrendingUp, CheckCircle, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Aptitude Assessment', description: 'Take our comprehensive psychometric quiz to discover your strengths and interests.' }, { icon: , title: 'Course Mapping', description: 'Explore detailed career paths and course options tailored to your profile.' }, { icon: , title: 'College Directory', description: 'Find the perfect colleges and universities with our comprehensive database.' }, { icon: , title: 'Career Guidance', description: 'Get personalized recommendations for your academic and career journey.' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10,000+', label: 'Students Guided' }, { number: '500+', label: 'Colleges Listed' }, { number: '95%', label: 'Satisfaction Rate' }, { number: '50+', label: 'Career Paths' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Discover Your Perfect Career Path

Take our scientifically-designed aptitude test and get personalized recommendations for your academic and career journey.

{user ? ( Take Assessment ) : ( <> Get Started Free Try Demo Quiz )}
{/* Features Section */}

Everything You Need for Career Success

Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools and guidance you need to make informed career decisions.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

Simple steps to discover your ideal career path

1

Take Assessment

Complete our comprehensive aptitude and interest quiz

2

Get Recommendations

Receive personalized course and career suggestions

3

Plan Your Future

Explore colleges, timelines, and career paths

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Discover Your Path?

Join thousands of students who have found their perfect career match through our platform.

{!user && ( Start Your Journey )}
); }; export default Home;
